document.full_text: nextera energy inc said its unit will sell 100.8 megawatts (mw) of wind energy to google inc's energy subsidiary, the companies' second such agreement that could help the internet search giant power its data centers using renewable sources of energy.
document.title: google unit to buy more wind power from nextera
lines_and_colors: nextera energy inc said its unit will sell 100.8 megawatts (mw) of wind energy to google inc's energy subsidiary, the companies' second such agreement that could help the internet search giant power its data centers using renewable sources of energy.
